text: tama sthanayanhima rændi sitiyavun allahge dutayanan (tabuk meheyumata) giya pasu va satutu vuha. tama vastuva ha tama jivita allahge margaye kæpa kirimata ovuhu pilikul kaloya. tavada numbala grisma kalayehi pitat va noyanu yæyi ovuhu pavasati. ovuhu avabodha kara ganne nam, nira ginna usnatvayen ita vada adhika yæyi (nabivaraya!) numba pavasanu
